title: ANOTION Iced Coffee Cup, Mason Jar with Lid and Straw 24oz Wide Mouth Boba Cup Reusable Drinking Glasses Tumbler Smoothie Water Bottles Margaritas Juice Cocktail Travel Office Home, 4 Packs
features: STYLISH ICED COFFEE CUP - A clean silhouette nods to the classic container in this clever mason jar. Stylish yet cute "coffee" not only adorn the jar, but also adorn your coffee time. This set contains 4*24oz iced coffee cups, 4 matching wooden lids and glass straws, a straw brush.

LARGE CAPACITY AND NATURAL WOODEN LID - Large capacity of 24 oz/710 ml. You can enjoy your drinks without worrying about spilling it, because of the wooden lids with silicone ring. It also has glass straw which lets you drink from the jars without opening the lids.

EASY TO CLEAN - Wide mouth design makes the mason jar sippy cup easy to clean. And smooth inner wall will not absorb food or pigments. Using the cleaning brush, you can easily clean the long straws without any difficulty.

ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY AND REUSABLE - Become more socially responsible by using ANOTION mason jars. You can keep food and drinks with confidence since they are reusable and ecologically friendly. The reusable smoothie cup with glass straw may be used indefinitely to replace the disposable plastic boba cup and straw.

MULTI-PURPOSE AND GOOD FOR GIFTING - Perfect for preserves, canning, jelly beans, jellies or honey, milkshakes, smoothies, etc. It can be used while travelling, in office, school and home. A good gift for your family, friends and colleagues on birthdays, Thanksgiving, Christmas, anniversaries, or as a gift to your Boba lovers. We have designed a safe packaging for each glass bottle, and it will be delivered to you in the best condition.
description: FEATURES: Iced Coffee Cup Trendy and stylish wooden lid cover glass straws Large 24 oz/710 ml capacity Reusable and environment friendly
